thread.section_title: City Finance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of City Finance | cityfinance.com.au | 3 of 4
thread.title: Heather Simpson
thread.title_full: City Finance reviewed by Heather Simpson

author: Heather Simpson
title: Heather Simpson
text: i have been with city finance now for over 12 years when i need to get a small loan i only turn to one finance company that is city finance the staff are there to help you and to get your loan through as fast as they can it only takes 1 day and you have the money in your bank account i find that there fees are low and the repayment so if you are looking for a loan look no were but to city finance and you to could be as happy as i am so call then and talk to one of the loans operator i will never look any where else for my loans
